pullrequest.title: Parallelize ODE physics with threaded islands parameter

content.raw:
I didn't get to run the integration tests after I saw your comments that the issue didn't come back again, but I do use the .world file and tested the speedup was obvious. Some quick guess:      
1. the 500 steps is not enough to warm up  
2. I will run this test locally and see whether it is 3 repetitions all failed, or just 1 or 2 failed with large value    
3. I will print out the # of island the ODE figures out and see how it matches with the # of thread we provide
content.html:
I didn't get to run the integration tests after I saw your comments that the issue didn't come back again, but I do use the .world file and tested the speedup was obvious. Some quick guess:
1. the 500 steps is not enough to warm up
2. I will run this test locally and see whether it is 3 repetitions all failed, or just 1 or 2 failed with large value
3. I will print out the # of island the ODE figures out and see how it matches with the # of thread we provide
